title: Amazon Cyber Monday Deals 2018 - Violet Love Womens Yoga Headband - Couture Headbands, Best Non-Slip Sport Headbands for Women, Girls, Men, Walking, Exercise - Free Spirit - msrp $17
features: PREMIUM QUALITY NO SLIP HEADBAND - Looking for the perfect way to keep your hair up and your face clean during a workout or just plain old work? Our premium headbands feature fashionable, custom prints and exclusive buttery-soft fabric to help you stay comfortable in style.

SOFT, BREATHABLE, WASHABLE - Unsatisfied with cheap hairbands? These high quality bands are designed to stay in place during light and heavy activity, to the point where you will forget that you are even wearing it! This headband is a great accessory for casual wear in places like the office, beach, gym, travel, hiking, sailing, camping, your home and your own back yard.

SOFT ABSORBANT FABRIC - The headbands are precision cut and comfortably sized headbands that are composed of a stretchy poly/lycra blend. The materials are UV resistant and will help keep you from getting sunburned while working and relaxing outdoors!

ADJUSTABLE FOR PERFECT COVERAGE - The no slip reversable design means that you can adjust your headband in a way that works the best for you. Wear it wide, narrow, folded or even twisted to create your own unique look. The adjustable design makes it easy to use as an ear warmer which means you can keep it on in any season.
HIGH QUALITY MATERIALS - All headbands come with an eye catching solid color and are made of a single-brushed 94% Poly/6% Spandex machine washable fabric.
